title: Bilgewater: Burning Tides sails over the horizon

replies.body: OCE comment section is such a graveyard I doubt even Rioters come here.
Hi! We do read the comment section :P

You do?? Can yo guys at least consider three different things for the nostalgia?? Firstly Please bring back the very first and very original ARAM map if not for only a special event because I really want to be on that once again... Second of all Can you think about an option to change between the two hud's?? =/ And thirdly an option to change maps??? I don't want to have to resort to unstable 3rd party programs just to get the feeling I first got when playing league.

Yes we do read comments :) I can see that you're wanting to relive all those feelings you once had when you first played LOL, along with some other changes. Because this isn't my area of expertise, I'm not the best person to speak to about this. In saying that, we did do a [recent post here](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/riot-games/announcements/riot-pls) where we talked about the priorities and values that influence what we’re doing, what we’re not doing, and why. Hopefully that gives you more context in the way we go about making decisions.

I understand the whole decision to makes the change. It's just whenever I go into a match now I feel like I'm playing a league-cross-dota game and I know that's cliché but I just want to feel like I'm playing league of legends... Not league of everchanging, forgotten legends. (No offense)
logging in just to up vote the Dev who let them know ^_^
Not really much to discuss about this, is there? Smartass.
Awww man, I came so close to earning that last icon! Will there be any way to get any of the icons we missed out on after this, or was Burning Tides our only chance?
Yeah I was 1 win off and lost 5 in a row just before it ended haha, shouldn't have waited so long
yea i think i got it just didnt do the submit thing :/ any idea if they can still send it?
What is happening with butchers bridge?

Yea, I wish they'd go back to it. I like the Abyss and all, but we didn't go back to Murder Bridge after the Freljord event... Butchers Bridge was to ARAM what the new Summoners Rift was to norms and ranked. 
In my opinion, it makes little sense to go back to an old map with comparatively outdated graphics.
Can't wait to get Captain Gangplank
Agreed,i bought {{champion:41}} just for this =.=
same

Keep in mind what they did last time they released a skin as a reward; they gave it out in batches. 
Some people will have it already (like me) and some people might have to wait a week or two as Riot gets around to their group.

Awesome!
However Riot, i have some feedback for the 5.15 version of the new HUD.
During Act 2 of Burning tides, you introduced the new HUD. This was a great new revamp of the old HUD. However, the best part was the the Kills/Death/Assists counter was close to the Mini-Map. This made it easier to glean all the relevant information by looking at the bottom-right of the screen. 
With Patch 5.15, however, this counter has gone back up to the top-right. 
This brings back the problems of the old lay-out, where i now have to move my eyes off the action and onto the bottom, bottom right and top right of the screen.

So please, look into re-integrating the K/D/A counter back to the bottom right, where all the other necessary information resides.
They did give an announcement that the even was ending soon, about three days before it did. Not their fault you didn't see it
Why do u leave ur last win when u can just get it :\
i logged on and it said i got the skin, but when i went to check it, it says in unavailable. Anyone know why?
Maybe just a bug in the system
Sorry for the confusion. The skin is not yet available for purchase, so it shows as unavailable in your profile. But you CAN select the skin in champ select and use it in game if you already own it.
oh ok thanks
Who ends an event at 8.30pm... seriously?  I was one game away from finishing because I flew to big top OPL over the weekend :(
Ah damnit, I thought it ended tonight not last night :/ there goes all my effort into that gp icon ugh!
now..... i shall leave my mark :D {{champion:114}}
I was a big fan of the Sea shanty song that replaced the usual summoners rift music, i know in the past riot has released the song like with URF intro music etc, is there anywhere to get that?
soundcloud ;)

i was 1 game away from finishing off the last act for the final GP icon, q'd up (had been playing for like the last 36 hours straight trying to finish it) and boom, error que not available, i missed out :( i'm a long time epic GP player too, critplank spec, darn. pretty sure i've got the skin tho :) thanks heaps
36 hours? to finish the last act? Took me 8 games to finish it. btw in 2nd act you can kill 500 minions in normals not only butchers bridge.
wtf? it says aram minions so i thought u can only kill aram minions... o well, and btw the gp icon is harder to get than the tf/graves one

Wow, I return to the League after a small hiatus, and come in on the tail end of an event I would've actually loved to take part in. Oh well, Hopefully I'll be active next time something similar comes around. Maybe something to do with {{champion:81}} or {{champion:19}} if I'm lucky.

hmmm so can anyone enlighten me what was the point of this whole event?
...getting players involved in the lore? what for?

it just felt really out of place as LoL isn't role playing game in any way.
Also, new skin for ARAM and it's thrown away as I guessed before, 2 new splash arts for gangplank, lots of login screens, like, seriously, how does it all relate to competitive game experience?

(I'm honestly asking, as in my opinion it was a pointless waste of resources)

Because giving players a thing to work towards causes them to come back.

For instance if I got home from work and I have the choice between Rocket League and LoL, I'd choose LoL because "I need to earn that icon before it goes away"
yeah cept no-one in their right mind would choose LoL over Rocket League
Srsly? Well i had bad luck cuz my pc broke and it took 5 days, then i was sick and i didn't feel like gaming. I guess 2 black market and 1 icon is enough for me
Happy normals!
yea i got the last icon but didnt do the submit thing or w/e so i didnt actual get it can you fix that? please email me if you can

Aaahhhh, the Bilgewater event, though it brought some beautiful things, it also completely trashed Gangplank's personality. Though he has a better kit, he is NO WHERE near as fun as he use to be. RIP GANGPLANK 2K15
RIP {{item:3829}}
hope new mode will be fun in the future
so its over i needed to get my selfie of gp{{champion:41}}
Ah but dead mans plate is gonna come back though as a permanent item.
